author: Lesley Waters
method: Place all the ingredients except the sponge fingers into a bowl and mix together. Spoon the mixture into a tall glass on a plate with the sponge fingers served alongside.
ingredients: 75ml/3fl oz whipped cream,  75ml/3fl oz mascarpone,  75g/3oz pistachio nuts, finely chopped ,  2 tbsp icing sugar,  1 orange, juice and zest only,  3 ready-made sponge fingers, to serve
